attributes.action: Ban auditors taking on other business(such as tax or employment advice) with the company they audit.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Along with the Association for Accountancy and Business Affairs (PO Box 5874, Basildon, Essex, SS16 5FR) I`d like to get Government to ban auditors taking on other business, such as tax or employment advice, with the company they audit.

It creates a collusion in which the auditors clearly lose independence and are prepared to soften the audit to secure other, and more profitable, business.  Both Government and the regulators have consistently refused to do this even though in the US the SEC has managed to restrict what other services can be offered.

Enron & Arthur Andersen are a simple example everyone should relate to.
